divs: Sighting Details I was walking down a path by my home. I looked up and saw this light it was perfectly round about the size of a large plate. It decended towards me about a mile away or closer. At a 45 degree angle when it reached some trees it shot up and with in a second it was the size of a star and disapeard I told me wife to look but it was so fast she did not see it .
Summary: Round Light size of the moon when first sighted decended towards me.
